topic.title: CSUB Example: Other Methods of Viewing Output

para.text: CSUB Example: Other Methods of Viewing Output
There are some other tools that can be helpful for viewing the CSUB output. First of all, there are other ways of using GW_Chart. For example, select
to MODFLOW 6, and click the Open File button
. Select the MODFLOW 6 Listing file. GW_Chart will initially plot all the CUMULATIVE amounts. You can change CUMULATIVE to RATES and select the budget terms that are of most interest to you.

image.title: Plot of Budget Terms over Time in CSUB example mode.

para.text: Another tool you can use is ListingAnalyst. It produces what is essentially a table of contents and index of the MODFLOW listing file. Just click the
button and select the listing file.
